content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that budget is a concern for you, so I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I am looking for something affordable. I understand that you may have other offers, but I am hoping to be able to negotiate the price with you. Could you give me an initial offer?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand your budget as a student, and I am willing to be flexible in order to accommodate your needs. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to offer you a monthly rental price of €500. However, I am open to discussing any potential discounts or concessions that you may be looking for in order to make the rental price more affordable for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the price. I am willing to pay €450 per month if you can afford it. Is that possible?

Also, I would like to make sure that I am on good terms with my landlord. I would like to be able to contact you directly if I have any questions or concerns.

Is that possible?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Nesibe Trabelsi.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I appreciate your interest in negotiating the rental price, and I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on your offer of €450 per month, I am able to accept that price and I am happy to have you as my tenant. In terms of communication, I am always available to answer any questions or concerns that you may have. I would like to make sure that our relationship is positive and professional, so please feel free to reach out to me directly at any time. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
